markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Alchemical Crafting](/Feats.aspx?ID=752) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 258 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4)

</column>

---

You can use the Craft activity to create alchemical items. When you select this feat, you immediately add the formulas for four common 1st-level alchemical items to your formula book.

<title level="2">Alchemical Crafting leads to...</title>
[Assassin Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1890)
name: Alchemical Crafting
